attributes.action: Stop members of parliament claiming for second homes.
attributes.additional_details:
Members of parliament claim far to many expenses, they do not need a second home paid for by the tax payer enabling them to sell it at a profit and keep the money when they are no longer an MP.
They should be made to pay all the money from any sale back to the treasury.
attributes.background: Stop members of parliament claiming so many expenses.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
